name: universal-js-boilerplate
description: This is a Node/Browserify/Babel/Backbone/React/etc boilerplate. To be used as an initial scaffolding tool.
author: Matthew Keas <matthiasak@gmail.com>

scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css; sane 'npm run build:css' ./scss --glob='**/*.css' --glob='**/*.scss'
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=eee mocha ./js/test --compilers js:babel/register --recursive; echo '----- tests done'
scripts.bower: bower install normalize-scss foundation typeplate-starter-kit pace; echo 'bower dependencies installed';
scripts.production-setup: [ "$NODE_ENV" == production ] && npm-run-all build; echo 'built for deployment';
scripts.docs:publish: git add --all . && git commit -am 'cleaning up any staged and uncomitted changes'; git checkout master; npm run docs; git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && cp -rf ./dist/esdoc/* . && git add ast class css file identifiers.html index.html script variable badge.svg coverage.json dump.json function image package.json source.html && git commit -am 'cleaning and pushing' && git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages --force; git checkout master; git branch -Dq gh-pages; echo 'done';
scripts.gh-pages: git add . && git commit -am 'cleaning up any staged and uncomitted changes'; git checkout master; npm-run-all build:* && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && cp dist/app-browserify.js . && cp dist/style.css . && git add app-browserify.js style.css && git commit -am 'cleaning and pushing' && git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages --force; git checkout master; git branch -Dq gh-pages; echo 'done';
scripts.clean:subtrees: git reflog expire --all --expire-unreachable=0; git repack -A -d; git prune; git gc;
scripts.teardown:
surge list; echo 'type a domain from above: 
 ------------ 

 '; surge teardown
